content: work as follows holding camisole and sleeve together and working through both thicknesses single_crochet for 21 sts finish working the foundation row of the sleeve around to first st join do not fasten_off continue to work on camisole up the strap to back and across to where the sleeve joins work across the top of the sleeve to join with slip_stitch where sleeve meets camisole fasten_off enjoy thank you for you order should you have any problems with this pattern please feel free to contact me at angela best@sympatico ca ©angela best2007 sweetie pie cami http //lavonneknotjustknits com 3
